actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Government Reform and Oversight, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Government Reform and Oversight
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology

official_title: To establish a Corporate Welfare Reduction Commission, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Corporate Welfare Reduction Act - Establishes an independent Corporate Welfare Reduction Commission to recommend reductions in corporate subsidies to reduce the Federal budget deficit. Establishes in the Congress a Joint Committee on Corporate Subsidy Reduction. Sets forth requirements for congressional consideration of Commission reports.

titles.title: To establish a Corporate Welfare Reduction Commission, and for other purposes.
